price: Wͻsuro wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn a Ɔwͻ wͻn soro anaasε Ɔso bro wͻn soͻ no, na deε yɛahyε wͻn sε wͻnyε no εno ara na wͻyε.
arabic: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ۩

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yakhāfūna rabbahum min fawqihim wayafʿalūna mā yu'marūna
